name.value: FHIR Connectathon 14 - Patient - Formal Testing - FHIR Client - Update - Client Assigned Resource Id - XML

description.value: Patient Track - Formal Testing - tests external FHIR Client using the XML format to update a Patient resource instance created in the test setup where the client assigns the resource id. The destination server must support conditional create using the update (PUT) operation, read, update and delete to insure the Patient resource does not exist or is removed prior to test execution.
Patient read, update and delete operations

Enter the patient given name the origin system will send to the destination system.
Enter the patient gender the origin system will send to the destination system.
